DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study comparison effect acupuncture Fluoxetine improvement quality life among menopausal woman .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Acupuncture Fluoxetine Quality Life Menopausal Women
DOC.detailed_description: This clinical trial design two arm include acupuncture fluoxetine group evaluate effect intervention improvement quality life among menopausal woman .
DOC.criteria: Last menstrual cycle 12 month ago natural menopause 4 episode hot flash daily follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) = 30110 IU/L , E2 < 18pg/ml thyroidstimulating hormone ( TSH ) = 0.44/0 IU/ml No use herbal agent treatment hot flash score Beck depression Inventory < 10 No existence medical problem use drug Not complete acupuncture session Not complete fluoxetine admission Withdraw study
